TopicTitle: First time playing KSP in 2.5 months!

Articles.Content:
My CPU is working again!

For the first time in so long, I can play KSP again.

Wohoo!

I'm so happy!

I can finally do all the cool things I have wanted to do and catch up on all the things I missed out on!

YAY!

What should I do?

Go back to Laythe?

Land on Duna?

Make a base on Minmus?

Set up the Colony on Eve?

I think I'll go to Eve.

And other things or ideas?

I can't wait, it's almost done re-downloading!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T09:02:22Z" title="03/31/2015 09:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by DMSP**
make a bra for asteroids! and get E class asteroids in it
the only thing you have to remember however, is "Don't stop, Believing"
Congratulations! I know the feeling; I just got my computer working a few weeks ago myself.
Build a space disco in orbit!

Great-ish ideas!

Lol jk.

I just sent my Eve colony out!

Darn it, save failure.

I'm starting again completely stock.

Myself I never worry about my save corrupting as I use [jebretary](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72212-Jebretary-Automatic-Version-Control-%28backups%29-for-craft-and-saves-v0-4-0), a GIT based version tracker for your saves and craft. Every save is kept along with every craft and all the versions of each from the first to the latest and you can revert to any save or previous version of a craft through your browser.

If my save corrupts I just go back to the latest working version. It also does subassemblies.
